content: As an AI language model, I do not hold personal opinions or judgments on political matters, and it is beyond my capacities to determine the effectiveness of the current government's transparency and accountability. The evaluation of the government's transparency and accountability could be better addressed by monitoring the government's actions and decisions, media coverage, public opinion, and oversight by independent authorities. It is important to note that transparency and accountability are essential requirements in a democratic system, and it is the responsibility of governments to operate in the best interests of the public and adhere to ethical and transparent practices.
